full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Title

Clerk, Records Management - Temporary Workload Increase

### Tender Reference Number

CB-140-40528030

### Solicitation Number

10077978-B

### Publication and Tender Closing Dates

**Publication Date**: 2024-01-31
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-16 by 14:00:00

### Notice Type and Procurement Method

The request for proposal is a competitive selective tendering process for temporary personnel services.

### Procurement Category and Selection Criteria

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Terms of Trade

This request is covered by the following Canadian Trade Agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Details

* **Unclassified Trade IPCC Table**: 80111600 - Temporary personnel services
* **GSA (Government Services Administration) Codes**: None
* **Location of Work**: Ottawa, Quebec
* **Services Required**: Temporary clerks for records management services
* **Contracting Entity**: Public Services and Procurement Canada
* **Contracting Officer**: Eric Beaudry
* **Contracting Officer's Details**:
  * Email: eric.beaudry@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  * Phone: (873) 355-4728
  * Address: 11 rue Laurier, Gatineau, QC K1A 0H3, Canada

### Relevant Documents and Attachments

The tender notice and supporting documentation can be downloaded from the following link:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30897/10077978-b-npp.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30897/10077978-b-apm.pdf

### Submission Deadline

Please submit your proposals by 14:00:00 on 2024-02-16 to be considered for this tender opportunity. We thank you for your interest and look forward to reviewing your proposals. thrivingamshoot90@freelance
